description:
Course Content Recorded & Updated: November 12, 2015

Join Over 2,200 Students!!

If you always wanted to produce music and make beats but have little to no experience and absolutely no clue where to start.

This course is the perfect solution to your problem. Geared toward the beginner you will learn the fundamentals of music production and how to make your own beats from scratch!

Read what some of my current students had to say about the course!

"I knew nothing about loops or recording them Now I know about the basics"

- John Tait

"The instructor guides you in what your studio needs and gives a quick break down on producing a beat."

- Jeremy Burt

"Short, sweet and easy first step on the musical journey. A good place to start for absolute beginners. The fundamentals explained in an easy to get fashion."

- Vidar

Waste no more time trying to find out how to make beats on your own! Get all the information you need to learn the basics of music production all in one course.

Enroll now!
title: Beat Making Fundamentals For Beginners
